name: Galactic Fix
description:
Galactic Fix is a co-op simulation game with two mechanics repairing as many ships as they can. Fix your way through the stars and aim for that star-studded high-score!

This project was made as a submission for the Global Game Jam 2020 and won the Jammer's Choice award at the CIIT site.

GGJ game page: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/galactic-fix-2
